comment.author: 49171302@N05
comment._content: Hi perhaps it is not swedish but danish origin. Looks like the barque Throra build by Abrahamsen, Fanø, Denmark in 1896. www.mitfanoe.dk/Sejlskibstiden/Skibsbyggeriet p%c3%a5 Fan%c3%b8/S%c3%b8ren Abrahamsen.htm It was in Sydney/Newcastle in 1907 trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14830459 It was shipwrecked in Cuba 1910 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9904EEDE1330E233A... cheers Michael

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content:
Thanks Michael, I will pass onto the curatorial team to confirm.
Karen Roberts, Online Services
